import React,{ Component } from 'react' import { Row,Col,Form,Input,Select } from 'antd' import MonacoEditor from 'react-monaco-editor'; import { monacoEditorConfig } from '../../../config/monacoEditor' const { Option } = Select; class SettingDataForm extends Component{ onChange = (newValue,event) => { console.log("event",event) console.log("onChange", newValue); // eslint-disable-line no-console }; editorDidMount = (editor,monaco) => { console.log(editor) console.log(monaco) }; render(){ return (
) } } export default SettingDataForm
